item.title: [HackTheBox] "Calamity" machine writeup (Checkpoint style)
item.description: Legend: [*] – Info [+] – Progress [-] – No use / Dead end [!] – Important [?] – Maybe useful ========== – Next stage Files: https://github.com/limitedeternity/HackTheBox/tree/main/Machines/CALAMITY Checkpoints: [*] 80/tcp: Apache 2.4.18 [*] wfuzz: /admin.php /uploads (has listing) [+] $ curl http://10.10.10.27/admin.php yields password. [+] Logged in as admin. [+] The most elite RCE there. <?php sleep(10); ?> [*] We’ll use it to upload a shell to /uploads.

item.title: [HackTheBox] "Enterprise" machine writeup (Checkpoint style)
item.description: Legend: [*] – Info [+] – Progress [-] – No use / Dead end [!] – Important [?] – Maybe useful ========== – Next stage Files: https://github.com/limitedeternity/HackTheBox/tree/main/Machines/ENTERPRISE Checkpoints: [*] 443/tcp: Apache 2.4.25 [*] Possible hostname: enterprise.local / enterprise.htb [+] Username: jeanlucpicard [+] Interesting endpoint: /files (Status: 301) [+] Interesting file: /files/lcars.zip [!] PHP files! [*] Mentions “wp-config.php”. This is WordPress plugin. Moving to 80/tcp. =========== [*] 80/tcp: Apache 2.

item.title: Info about "Plantain" transport card used in Saint-Petersburg, Russia
About
item.description: Hello! My nickname is Marise Hayashi (limitedeternity). I’m a software developer and a student of Herzen RSPU. There I’ll publish my thoughts and researches.
